description: Oppo announced a new on-device artificial intelligence (AI) innovation on Wednesday. The consumer tech brand stated that it plans to implement mixture-of-experts (MoE) AI architecture to substantially reduce energy consumption, while also improving processing speed. The company highlighted that it collaborated with leading chipset manufacturers to develop the technology for smartphones and similar devices. However, Oppo did not reveal which future smartphones will be equipped with this technology.
title: Oppo to Implement On-Device Mixture-of-Experts AI Architecture for Improved Battery Life

description: Despite several rumours about an affordable book-style foldable from Samsung, it has now been reported that the brand is currently not working on a Galaxy Z Fold 6 with a lower price tag. Samsung recently launched the Galaxy Z Fold 6 Special Edition, which offers a bigger display with a slimmer design. However, the new foldable is currently limited to the South Korean market.
title: Samsung Has No Plans for an Affordable Foldable, but Will Offer Variety Instead: Report

description: Oppo Find X8 series will be launched on October 24 in China and the brand keeps on teasing its upcoming devices online. Most recently, Oppo revealed the display, camera, battery and charging details of the Oppo Find X8 and Oppo Find X8 Pro. The vanilla model is confirmed to house a 5,630mAh battery, while the Pro model will carry a 5,910mAh battery. Additionally, Oppo Find X8 and Find X8 Pro appeared in the AI-Benchmark test with top scores.
title: Oppo Find X8 Pro to Arrive With Dual Periscope Telephoto Cameras; Tops AI Benchmark Chart

description: Realme announced that it will hold an event called 'The Dark Horse of AI' this week, where it will share its artificial intelligence (AI) strategy. The event is scheduled for October 25, and the consumer tech brand is expected to announce its strategic partnership with Google and Qualcomm. Additionally, the company will also share details about the upcoming Realme GT 7 Pro smartphone.
title: Realme Schedules ‘The Dark Horse of AI’ Event for October 25 to Reveal AI Strategy

description: Redmi is reportedly working on two new smartphones. They are speculated to be the Turbo 4 and Turbo 4 Pro. A tipster has shared some key expected features of the purported handsets including chipset and battery details. The rumoured Redmi Turbo 4 is expected to succeed the Redmi Turbo 3, which was unveiled in China in April this year.
title: Redmi Turbo 4 Series Tipped to Be Under Development; Key Features Leaked by Tipster

description: Xiaomi 15 series is confirmed to debut by the end of this month with the new Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset under the hood. The Chinese smartphone brand did not share an exact launch date for the Xiaomi 15 series, but a new report suggests the tentative release date. The new lineup is said to be announced with the HyperOS 2.0. The Xiaomi 15 is expected to arrive with a 6.36-inch AMOLED display with a 1.5K resolution and Leica-tuned triple rear cameras.
title: Xiaomi 15 Series Launch Date Reportedly Set for October 29; Could Arrive Alongside HyperOS 2.0

description: Canva announced a new text-to-image artificial intelligence (AI) generation tool and added several new features to its Visual Suite on Wednesday. The Sydney-based visual communications platform introduced AI image generator Dream Lab, a platform that was built on the tech stack of Leonardo.Ai, just three months after it was acquired. Additionally, it also added new tools such as Magic Write, polls and quizzes, interactive charts, and AI-powered whiteboards to Visual Suites.
title: Canva Dream Lab AI Image Generator Launched; Visual Suite Updated With New Features

description: Bharat Sanchar Nigam (BSNL) will not increase tariffs in the near term, the state-owned telecom operator’s Chairman and Managing Director reportedly announced on Tuesday. The official highlighted that BSNL will focus on improving its quality of services to retain the new consumers it gained following the price hike rolled out in India by telecom operators such as Bharti Airtel and Reliance Jio.
title: BSNL Will Improve Quality of Services Instead of Raising Tariffs: CMD Robert Ravi

description: The promo for The Miranda Brothers introduces us to Harshvardhan Rane’s intense character, Julio Miranda, whose anger threatens to destroy everything in its path. Directed by Sanjay Gupta, this sports-action drama is a blend of family conflict and football, with Meezan Jaafri, Sanjay Suri, and Rahul Dev playing key roles. Streaming on JioCinema Premium from 25th October, the film promises an emotional rollercoaster with plenty of action and drama.
title: The Miranda Brothers OTT Release Date: Harshvardhan Rane's Julio Miranda Battles Anger in New Sports Drama

description: OnePlus 13 will be unveiled in China on October 31. After plenty of leaks and rumours, OnePlus has revealed a benchmark result of the phone giving us an idea of how the Snapdragon 8 Elite chip performs. It is teased to feature up to 24GB RAM and a maximum of 1TB of storage.
title: OnePlus 13 Scores Over 3 Million Points in AnTuTu Benchmark Results; Geekbench Test Scores Leaked

description: Paytm has said that it has received approval from the country's payments authority to onboard new unified payment interface (UPI) users. The NPCI's approval comes after Paytm submitted a request earlier in August this year.
title: Paytm Gets Approval from NPCI to Enroll New UPI Users

description: Flipkart Big Diwali Sale 2024 started in India for all users on October 21 and will last till October 31. During the ongoing sale, the e-commerce site is offering a wide range of products at a discounted rate including electronic items. Here, we have compiled a list of the best deals you can get on Apple's iPhones.
title: Flipkart Big Diwali Sale 2024: Best Deals on iPhone 16 Pro Max, iPhone 15 Plus, iPhone 14 and More

description: Meta has removed several accounts across Threads and Instagram that were used to track celebrities’ private jets. The accounts, which rely on publicly available information to track a jet’s location and CO2 emissions, among other details, were banned without warning this week after Meta updated its privacy policy.
title: Meta Bans Accounts Tracking Private Jets for Mark Zuckerberg, Elon Musk

description: The Bank of International Settlements (BIS) and the Financial Stability Board (FSB) have published their respective reports on VDAs, addressed to the G20 group. The Finance Ministers and Central Bank Governors of the G20 nations are scheduled to meet on October 23-24. The release of these reports by these financial institutes is well aligned with these meetings.
title: BIS, FSB Reports Highlight Benefits and Risks of Asset Tokenisation

description: The much-anticipated thriller Do Patti, featuring Kajol and Kriti Sanon, will premiere on Netflix on October 25, 2024. The film delves into the tense relationship between twin sisters Saumya and Shailee, both played by Sanon, and their rivalry over the same man. Kajol plays a determined police officer, Vidya, who is tasked with solving a crime connected to the sisters' rivalry. Directed by Shashanka Chaturvedi, Do Patti promises gripping suspense and emotional depth. Don’t miss it!
title: Do Patti OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Kajol, Kriti Sanon’s Mystery Thriller

description: Million Dollar Listing India is set to premiere on SonyLIV on October 25, 2024. The show brings viewers an inside look at the competitive world of luxury real estate, featuring six top agents who navigate the high-stakes process of selling India’s most exclusive properties. With stunning homes, intense negotiations, and real estate drama, the show airs a new episode every Friday at 8 PM. The series promises a mix of glamour, competition, and a behind-the-scenes look at India’s elite property markets.
title: Million Dollar Listing India OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch SonyLIV's Real Estate Based Series

description: 'Signature' is a heartfelt film that takes viewers on an emotional journey, exploring the struggles of an elderly couple. Anupam Kher's remarkable performance captures the essence of love and loss, making it a must-watch. With a compelling storyline and strong supporting cast, the film resonates with those who appreciate stories about the value of life and relationships. Streaming now on ZEE5, 'Signature' is perfect for anyone looking for a film that prompts reflection and discussion.
title: Anupam Kher Starrer The Signature Streaming Now on ZEE5

description: WhatsApp is developing a custom sticker pack creation feature that will enable users to make their own packs, that can also be shared with other users on the platform. Here's everything you need to know about WhatsApp's custom sticker pack feature and how it works.
title: WhatsApp Working on Ability to Create and Share Custom Sticker Packs: Report

description: Samsung has announced the rollout of a new 4K generative wallpaper feature for its 2024 Neo QLED TVs and other models. Powered by Tizen OS, this feature leverages artificial intelligence (AI) to generate high-quality visuals based on the selected theme. The South Korean technology conglomerate claims it opens up more ways to personalise the user’s viewing experience.
title: Samsung Neo QLED and Other TVs Get 4K Generative Wallpaper Feature in Ambient Mode

description: Microsoft and OpenAI, in collaboration with the Lenfest Institute for Journalism, announced an AI Collaborative and Fellowship programme on Tuesday. With this programme, the two tech giants will spend upwards of $10 million (roughly Rs. 84.07 crores) in direct funding as well as enterprise credits to use proprietary software. The companies highlighted that the programme was aimed at increasing the adaptation of artificial intelligence (AI) in newsrooms.
title: Microsoft, OpenAI Are Spending Millions on News Outlets to Let Them Try Out AI Tools

description: Logitech M196 wireless mouse was launched in India on Tuesday. It supports Bluetooth connectivity and is compatible with both Windows and macOS. The mouse allows users to access the line-by-line scrolling feature. The company claims that people can use this to control their cursor on almost any surface.
title: Logitech M196 Wireless Mouse With Up to 12 Months Battery Life Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Realme GT 7 Pro is set to launch in India in November. Now, the company has confirmed the China launch date of the phone. Meanwhile, display details of the upcoming smartphone have also been teased. The phone is expected to launch in India in mid-November. It will come with Qualcomm's latest octa-core Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC.
title: Realme GT 7 Pro Launch Date Set for November 4; Display Details Teased

description: Scientists have discovered phosphorus-rich grains in samples from the asteroid Ryugu, brought back by Japan’s Hayabusa2 mission. These grains, thought to have come from the outer Solar System, may have interacted with early Earth’s water, releasing essential nutrients like phosphorus and nitrogen. This interaction could have played a role in the chemical reactions that led to the emergence of life. The discovery offers new insights into Earth’s origins and the chemical processes that shaped life on our planet.
title: Phosphorus Grains in Ryugu Samples Offer Insights into Earth’s Early Life Chemistry

description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 FE 5G and Motorola Edge 50 Pro 5G are available at a starting price of Rs 29,999, respectively, during the festive sale. Both models offer some premium design language and come equipped with the latest hardware. In this comparison, we will talk in-depth about both the models and which one you should consider during this festive season.
title: Samsung Galaxy S23 FE 5G vs Motorola Edge 50 Pro 5G: Which is a Better Option to Consider?

description: Arm, based in the UK, has given Qualcomm a mandated 60-day notice of the cancellation of their so-called architectural license agreement, according to a document seen by Bloomberg. The contract allows Qualcomm to create its own chips based on standards owned by Arm.
title: Arm to Scrap Qualcomm Chip Design Licence in Feud Escalation

description: Snapdragon 8 Elite was unveiled at the company's annual Snapdragon Summit on Monday. rom performance and efficiency improvements to new features, here's everything you need to know about the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset that is expected to power flagship Android smartphones from several manufacturers.
title: Snapdragon 8 Elite: Top 10 Things to Know About Qualcomm’s Flagship Mobile Chipset

description: Runway AI, an artificial intelligence (AI) firm focusing on video generation models, announced a new feature on Tuesday. Dubbed Act-One, the new capability is available within the company’s latest Gen-3 Alpha large language model (LLM) and is said to accurately capture facial expressions from a source video and then reproduce them on an AI-generated character in a video.
title: Runway Act-One With AI-Powered Facial Expression Capture Capability Added to Gen-3 Alpha Model

description: On Tuesday, Qualcomm said it is working with Google to create a version of the company's Android Automotive OS that will run smoothly on Qualcomm chips.
title: Qualcomm, Alphabet Team Up for Automotive AI; Mercedes Inks Chip Deal

description: The overall valuation of the crypto market valuation dropped by 0.75 percent in the last 24 hours. Bitcoin joined Ether and majority cryptocurrencies to register price dips on Wednesday, October 23. Tron and Monero managed to hold onto small profits.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Records Minor Losses as Most Altcoins Move Sideways in Volatile Market

description: After its successful run in theatres, Deadpool & Wolverine will now stream on Disney+ Hotstar starting November 3. Fans in India can enjoy the action-packed Marvel film starring Ryan Reynolds and Hugh Jackman on this platform. Directed by Shawn Levy, the movie has been a massive box office hit, breaking records worldwide and now heading for its OTT release.
title: Deadpool & Wolverine OTT Release Date Reportedly Confirmed, Here's When and How to Watch Online

description: Huawei has announced its latest operating system (OS) in China which has been developed independently of Android. Dubbed HarmonyOS Next, it does not leverage Google's Android Open Source Project (AOSP) code which is adopted by original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) for developing Android skins for their devices. Instead, it is built on the Hongmeng kernel and system architecture, as per the company.
title: Huawei HarmonyOS Next With AI-Powered Features, New Customisations Announced: Compatible Devices, Features

description: Infinix Hot 50 Pro was launched in global markets as the latest 4G offering by the brand owned by China's Transsion Holdings. The new Hot series phone comes in three colour options and runs on a MediaTek Helio G100 SoC, coupled with 8GB RAM and up to 256GB storage. The Infinix Hot 50 Pro features a 6.78-inch display and is backed by a 5,000mAh battery.
title: Infinix Hot 50 Pro With MediaTek Helio G100 SoC, 5,000mAh Battery Launched: Specifications

description: Huawei Nova 13 series was unveiled in China on Tuesday. The lineup includes the Huawei Nova 13 and Nova 13 Pro. The phones are powered by Kirin 8000 chipsets paired with 12GB of onboard storage and 5,000mAh batteries with 100W wired fast charging support. They are equipped with 50-megapixel main cameras and 60-megapixel selfie shooters.
title: Huawei Nova 13, Nova 13 Pro With 60-Megapixel Selfie Cameras Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Ubisoft delayed Assassin’s Creed Shadows last month, announcing that the action-adventure title would launch in February 2025 instead of its planned November 15 release. In addition to the delay, the company announced it was cancelling Season Pass and early access plans for the game. Now, Ubisoft is cutting the price of Assassin’s Creed Shadows Collector’s Edition to reflect those changes.
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Collector's Edition Gets $50 Price Cut After Season Pass, Early Access Cancellation

description: The new 'International Incoming Spoofed Calls Prevention System' has been made operational and in just 24 hours the system has identified and blocked about 1.35 crore calls as spoofed calls.
title: New Spoofed Calls Prevention System Blocked 1.35 Crore International Calls in 24 Hours, Says DoT

description: Anthropic introduced two new artificial intelligence (AI) models and a new AI capability on Tuesday. The biggest introduction is an upgraded version of Claude 3.5 Sonnet which is claimed to offer improved benchmark scores across different categories. The new 3.5 Sonnet also gets a new capability dubbed Computer Use, which will allow it to understand and interact with computers, essentially allowing it to control and complete tasks on PCs.
title: Anthropic Introduces Upgraded Claude 3.5 Sonnet AI Model With Capability to Complete Tasks on PCs

description: Google Messages is rolling out several new features aimed at improving user privacy and protecting them from suspicious calls and messages. One of the additions is protection against scam texts related to package deliveries and jobs, leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) models. There are also features related to handling international callers and contact verifications.
title: Google Messages Rolls Out Sensitive Content Warning, Enhanced Spam Detection and More Features

description: Oppo Reno 13 Pro key specifications have surfaced on the Web. The upcoming Reno series phone is said to ship with a 6.78-inch screen with 1.5K resolution and a 50-megapixel periscope telephoto camera. The Oppo Reno 13 Pro could pack a 5,900 mAh battery and is likely to run on MediaTek's Dimensity 9300 chip.
title: Oppo Reno 13 Pro Tipped to Feature 3x Periscope Telephoto Sensor, 50W Wireless Charging

description: WhatsApp has announced that it will soon roll out a big change that will make managing contacts on linked devices an easier process. At present, users need to save a contact on their primary device for it to show up on WhatsApp with the saved name. However, this is now expected to change, following the announcement. Users will be able to add or manage contacts on WhatsApp for Web, Windows and other linked devices.
title: WhatsApp Will Soon Make It Easier to Add or Manage Contacts on Web and Other Linked Devices

description: Insta360 Ace Pro 2 was launched globally on Tuesday as the successor to the Ace Pro. The action camera is the latest addition to the Ace series and is claimed to bring better image quality, easier capturing, upgraded audio, more rugged design and enhanced artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities over the previous models.
title: Insta360 Ace Pro 2 With 8K Video Recording and AI Features Launched: Specifications, Price

description: Apple is said to be working on a new app for iOS that would integrate with a user's Game Center profile and keep them updated about games on Apple Arcade and the App Store. The iPhone maker is also reportedly considering the ability to let users talk to their Game Center friends via the company's FaceTime or iMessage apps via the gaming hub on iOS.
title: Apple Reportedly Developing Gaming Hub Focused on Apple Arcade and App Store Games

description: Pixel 9a is said to carry a 48-megapixel primary sensor, ditching the 64-megapixel main camera of its predecessor, Pixel 8a. It is likely to retain the 13-megapixel selfie snapper of the previous model. It is expected to come with the 'Add Me' feature.
title: Google Pixel 9a Will Reportedly Use 48-Megapixel Primary Camera From Pixel 9 Pro Fold
